mapper.select: SELECT e.`name` AS system_name, e1.`name` AS equipment_name, u.nuit AS unit_name, m.work_content as work_content, mr.* FROM maintain_record mr JOIN maintain m ON m.id = mr.maintain_id LEFT JOIN equipment e ON e.id = m.system_id LEFT JOIN equipment e1 ON e1.id = m.equipment_id LEFT JOIN unit u ON u.id = m.unit_id WHERE 1 = 1 and mr.create_time like #{date} and mr.department_id=#{departmentId} and mr.employee_id like concat("%",#{employeeId},"%") and mr.status=2 and mr.status!=2 order by mr.end_time desc,mr.create_time desc

SELECT p.id AS id,p.userNumber,p.companyId,p.companyName,p.departmentId,p.departmentName,p.userName AS userName,if(p.sex=1,"男","女") sex ,p.frequency AS frequency,pdd.point AS point FROM ( SELECT u.id,u.userName,u.sex,u.userNumber,c.id companyId,c. NAME companyName,c2.id departmentId,c2. NAME departmentName,COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM postPerator p JOIN users u ON u.Id = p.postPeratorId JOIN company c ON c.id = u.companyId JOIN company c2 ON c2.id = u.departmentId WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.inspectionEndTime IS NOT NULL AND p.created BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY p.postPeratorId ) p JOIN ( SELECT pd.createdBy AS createdBy,count(pd.postPeratorId) AS point FROM postPerator_data pd WHERE 1 = 1 AND pd.measuringTypeData IS NOT NULL AND pd.created BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY pd.createdBy ) pdd ON pdd.createdBy = p.Id
and p.departmentId=#{departmentId}

SELECT e.`name` AS system_name, e1.`name` AS equipment_name, u.nuit AS unit_name, m.* FROM maintain m LEFT JOIN equipment e ON e.id = m.system_id LEFT JOIN equipment e1 ON e1.id = m.equipment_id LEFT JOIN unit u ON u.id = m.unit_id where 1=1 and m.department_id=#{departmentId} and m.assignment_status=#{assignmentStatus} and unix_timestamp(now()) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(m.start_time) + m.cycle * 24 * 3600 order by m.assignment_status desc,m.start_time desc
